mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(createDate, '%y%m%d%H%i'), '%Y-%m') AS MONTH, COUNT(DISTINCT userID) AS LOGIN_USERS FROM statistic1.requestInfo r JOIN requestCode rc ON r.requestCode = rc.requestCode WHERE rc.code_explain = 'LOGIN' AND DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(createDate, '%y%m%d%H%i'), '%Y%m') = CONCAT('20', #{yearMonth}) GROUP BY MONTH ORDER BY MONTH;

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(createDate, '%y%m%d%H%i'), '%Y-%m-%d') AS DAY, COUNT(DISTINCT userID) AS LOGIN_USERS FROM statistic1.requestInfo r JOIN requestCode rc ON r.requestCode = rc.requestCode WHERE rc.code_explain = 'LOGIN' AND DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(createDate, '%y%m%d%H%i'), '%Y%m%d') = CONCAT('20', #{yearMonthDay}) GROUP BY DAY ORDER BY DAY;
